The bodhisattva who explains the profound and hidden meaning said to the bodhisattva who asks questions in accordance with principle:

If it is a provisional designation established by the original teacher, then it is accumulated through conceptualization and is spoken of through words;
If it is accumulated through conceptualization and is spoken of through words, then it is ultimately spoken of through the words of various conceptualizations.
Because it is not truly existent, it is not conditioned.
Good sons!
What is called unconditioned also falls into words.
Even if one speaks a little about conditioned and unconditioned things, their characteristics are also like this.

It refers to the fact that the noble ones, through noble wisdom and noble insight, are free from words and phrases, and thus realize perfect enlightenment;
